text: The city police on Friday detained Gunasekaran (31) of Dadagapatti under the Goondas Act. He was recently arrested for robbing a man at knife point. Inquiries revealed that he was already arrested last year in an attempt to murder case, and was also detained under Goondas Act in 2013. City Police Commissioner Sumit Saran ordered his detention under the Act.
title: Detained under Goondas Act
